channel.title: Help me please!
channel.description:
i recently downloaded: DeathlypvpzCv2.2 I open the source no problem. i tried opening the client and it says:
java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\.DeathlypvpzCv2.2\Data\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:138) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:97) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(FileReader.java:58) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:168) at client.startUp(client.java:8292) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:84) at client.run(client.java:5281) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) please help me now its saying:

item.title: Help me please!

item.description:
@abk14101 wrote:

this is the cache in the folder:

main_file_cache.dat
main_file_cache.idx0

main_file_cache.idx2

and where is that file missing from?

item.title: Help me please!
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

C:.DeathlypvpzCv2.2\Data\Maps\mapConfig.txt

That means the cache is missing the file “mapConfig.txt”
